actions.name: GetBillingData
actions.description: Grants permission to perform queries on billing information

actions.name: GetBillingDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to view detailed line item billing information

actions.name: GetBillingNotifications
actions.description: Grants permission to view notifications sent by AWS related to your accounts billing information

actions.name: GetBillingPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to view billing preferences such as reserved instance, savings plans and credits sharing

actions.name: GetContractInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to view the account's contract information including the contract number, end-user organization names, PO numbers and if the account is used to service public-sector customers

actions.name: GetCredits
actions.description: Grants permission to view credits that have been redeemed

actions.name: GetIAMAccessPreference
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the state of the Allow IAM Access billing preference

actions.name: GetSellerOfRecord
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the account's default Seller of Record

actions.name: ListBillingViews
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all your available billing views such as pro forma billing group related billing views

actions.name: PutContractInformation
actions.description: Grants permission to set the account's contract information end-user organization names and if the account is used to service public-sector customers

actions.name: RedeemCredits
actions.description: Grants permission to redeem an AWS credit

actions.name: UpdateBillingPreferences
actions.description: Grants permission to update billing preferences such as reserved instance, savings plans and credits sharing

actions.name: UpdateIAMAccessPreference
actions.description: Grants permission to update the Allow IAM Access billing preference
